trends: There have been no other sightings in West Alexander
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsLights came over the hill and drifted slowly and came to a stop for about 5 min. then drifted slowly NE. I was looking out the front of my house. They came up over the hill. Though it was an orb. My feelings i ran and got my wife and she saw it also. It disappeared behind the trees in our yard.
